event_type.description: Type of the event. Controlled vocabulary: 'relation_created' or 'relation_deleted'

creator.description: High-level name of the part which emmited this event.

source.description: Name of the source, algorithm or procedure, which created this event.

payload.description: Payload information specific to the event_type. An array, containing one or more payloads of the structure matching with the event_type.

id.description: Globally unique identifier of the event (UUID version 4 as specified in RFC 4122).

time.description: Time when the payload information was created.
